name: The Platformer (Rajbhumarkar)
description:
This is a small 5 Level Game made by me !!! In this game, you have to find the end gate and after finding it you will be promoted to the next level.

^^^^^^^^^Controls^^^^^^^^^^

Movement -> "A" and "D"

And Hold Tab to see the second camera(Wide Camera)

Jump-> "w"

The Fan and The Trophy Sprite was used by this asset |https://pixelfrog-assets.itch.io/pixel-adventure-1|

Thank you for playing my game
